headline: Jim Cramer Calls AMD a “Semi-Meaningful Competitor” to NVIDIA
summary: Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMD) is one of the 13 stocks Jim Cramer recently shed light on. During the episode, Cramer called the stock a “semi-meaningful competitor” to NVIDIA. He said: “Lately though, we’ve been seeing AMD, their only semi-meaningful competitor; stock’s up like 40 straight points, win[s] a lot of business. Same with Cisco, […]
